# NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.off

**Case**

Keepalives are disabled.

## Declaration

```swift
case off
```

## Keepalive Behaviors

- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.on**: Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.
- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.seconds(_:)**: Keepalives are enabled with a custom timeout, in seconds.

items.description: Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.
items.name: NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.on

items.description: Keepalives are enabled with a custom timeout, in seconds.
